guttmanlab.core.annotation

Class SingleInterval

  • java.lang.Object
    • guttmanlab.core.annotation.AbstractAnnotation
      • guttmanlab.core.annotation.SingleInterval
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Annotation
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContiguousWindow

    public class SingleInterval
extends AbstractAnnotation
    A class that represent a simple contiguous interval This is the basis for all features
    Author:
    mguttman
